Name: Name Change, Joe Paterno Park, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a park name, Joe Paterno Park, Borough of  Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1.  The following park name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
______________________________________________________________________________

New name		Present name				Limits
Joe Paterno Park	Red Hook Recreational Area	Lorraine Street between Hicks Street and  Court Street on the north, Court Street between Lorraine Street and Halleck Street on the east, Halleck Street and the property line of the Port Authority Grain Terminal on the south, Columbia Street between the property line of the Port Authority Grain Terminal and Halleck Street on the west, Halleck Street between Columbia Street and Otsego Street on the south and Otsego Street between Halleck Street and Bay Street on the west. 
 									
______________________________________________________________________________						
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
